content.question: Which of the following claims about the success of the Haitian Revolution is best supported by evidence in the excerpt?

choices.label: It became a symbol of Black freedom and power.
It caused France to have continued economic prosperity.
It inspired the French Revolution to be based on similar ideals.
It was made possible by the contributions of local maroons.

content.answer: It became a symbol of Black freedom and power.

skill.text: 3.B: Support a claim or argument using specific and relevant evidence.
